about_the_game:
Enjoy a fantasy world where you play as an ordinary (soon to be) housewife, Donna, and journey together with her as she works for Lawrence, the priest of the local church who most certainly only has the holiest of thoughts when he is staring at Donna’s voluptuous body. As Donna completes jobs, she will unlock higher paying tasks, even some of… questionable nature, giving her plenty of ways to earn even more money. But she’s got to do her part to reach her and her fiance’s goal of saving up 10,000 gold for their wedding, so she’ll take on any job that she can get! 

There are all manner of strange creatures in this world, and although Donna will mostly be spending "quality time" with Lawrence, she'll eventually have the chance to have plenty of “fun” with the other residents and beings of all shapes and sizes in this bustling fantasy world as well!

Perform various jobs around the church to advance the time of day as you work to earn more money. Every job moves the game timer forward until the day ends. You can even change Donna into a variety of outfits to unlock jobs! Cook, clean, make potions, read in the library, get tied up, learn how to properly service a man, there’s no shortage of things that Donna can find to fill the day… Or herself~ 

And the end of the game isn’t just the end! Once you have finished the main story, new activities and routes become available for you to explore and enjoy in the New Game Plus! Brothels, gloryholes, and definitely nothing involving horses~

Regardless of whichever route you choose to take, your time will surely be just as filled as Donna insides…

Choice Matters

During the game, there will be moments where decisions have to be made. This will both affect the story as you play, as well as determines which of the different endings you will ultimately achieve. Try your best to achieve the best possible ending for Donna, lest she ends up in someone else’s arms! …Or make her dive head first into a whole new world of depravity~

Progression

The story progresses based on how many in-game days you’ve gone through, which presents Donna with many opportunities to try out the different jobs and maybe “get some action” while doing it~

After Story

Once the main story is complete, you can play the New Game Plus, where you can replay the story with extra content! New routes to explore, choices to make, and events to discover!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains explicit nudity, sexual relationships, BDSM, and drug/alcohol abuse.

name: Philomel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

steam_germany.descriptors:
Sexualisierte Gewalt / Sexual violence
Derbe Sprache
Fantasy-Gewalt

short_description: Join Donna, a young wife trying to help her fiance earn enough funds for their wedding. There will be a wide variety of tasks, obstacles, and distractions along the way, but nothing can stand in the way of pure love! Not even a lecherous priest, or demons, and definitely not horses!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
